comment_body: I see this is private, clarify the public visibility below as well as sharing?  Why do we need to enable sharing and streaming API?
Isn't this just a repeat of the county above and shouldn't this just contain the district?
Clarify all of these record types
Same question also why does this need bulk?
Just to confirm the business cannot create a new flow because then it would not appear here correct without IT?

Clarify a few things:  I thought all of XD was going to use Secure API log and not API log, if yes, then why permission to API log. Also clarify the use of OmniscriptInstance - why this is editable?  has access to isContentEncoded, is LWCEnabled?.  Also why edit access on Account object?
Clarify the changes here as I'm seeing other teams items
Same Questions here, also I see many of the new CDC fields, yet I don't recall seeing the fields were they already pushed or are they in a separate PR?
